conversation.text: Based on your preferences, I would highly recommend "Maleficent". This Disney classic tells the story of a young woman named Maxine (played by Angelina Jolie Pitt)) who is born into a royal family and grows up learning that she was not meant for life in a monarchy but instead had been destined to take her place as the ruler of her kingdom. However, when she finds out that she has been chosen to take over her kingdom from a young girl named Minnie (played by Jennifer Jason Leigh)), she becomes increasingly conflicted and torn between her desire to take up her rightful position as the ruler of her kingdom and her fear and apprehension at the thought of having to take on the responsibilities of ruling over her kingdom, which she knows that she is not equipped for in terms of being able to effectively govern and lead her kingdom.
